channel.title: Help Please!
channel.description: Hi im wanting to make a thing where if the server catches someone using a chaos ring it ip bans them is there a way to do that?

item.title: Help Please!
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

idk for sure but i think you can make a command that says something like
{ if playerHasItem(####)&& playerRights >1
customCommand(“ipban”)
}

Idk if thats near right but i just typed that up… go ahead and try it but dont get mad if its wrong im just taking a shot in the dark here

Read full topic
